elements.name: Hero Section
elements.description: Welcome message with quick stats or search bar

elements.name: Utility Cards
elements.description: Grid of all available tools with icons and short descriptions

features: Drag & Drop Zone (dashed border, glowing on hover)
Floating Stats Panel (Words, Chars, Sentences, Reading Time)

assets.logo_strategy: Text-based with a colored accent dot or simple geometric shape (Square/Circle/Triangle)

universal_guidelines: Always use 'Outfit' font for headings and 'Inter' for body.
Ensure high contrast for text (WCAG AA).
Implement a responsive sidebar for navigation.
Add a 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
Do NOT use gradients for text, only for backgrounds or borders.
Cards must have a subtle glassmorphism effect.
Primary actions must use the Neon Green or Electric Blue accent.
Inputs must be large and accessible (min height 44px).
instructions_to_main_agent: Focus on the 'Bio-Digital' aesthetic. Think 'Hacker UI' meets 'Apple Design'. Clean, sharp, but with electric soul. Use the provided color palette strictly. Override Shadcn defaults to match this dark theme. For the charts/stats, use simple custom CSS or minimal Recharts if absolutely necessary.
